ComicInfo.Series: Iron Maiden Legacy of the Beast
ComicInfo.Summary:
After dark forces conspired to corrupt the fabric of reality, Eddie's immortal soul is shattered and strewn across the cosmos -this next episode has eddie facing armies from different world wars. Now, a weakened, primal Eddie must journey across space and time to battle the twisted legions of The Beast, seek out the lost shards of his soul, and bring order to the realms. With each victory, and with the aid of old friends, Eddie will restore his fearsome powers as he draws ever closer to facing the Unholy foe behind his fall... and thwarting a plot to unravel all of Creation!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------ A | Regular Cover | Santi Casas | 1 | B | Variant Cover | ? | Missing | C | Variant Cover | Jason Gorder | Missing | Note: The digital edition (2/21/2018) for this issue was released before the print edition.
